creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: 5" bands of cloth sewn together to make up ground fabric; long sleeves; straight open placket (no fastenings) on front; brown and white pinstriped background and purple, pink, aqua, yellow embroidery and mirrors
dimension:
23 3/4 x 40 1/2 in. (60.33 x 102.87 cm)
19 3/4 in. (50.17 cm) (object part, length, along bottom)
1 1/4 in. (3.18 cm) (object part, length, beaded fringe)
medium: Cotton, wool, silk, beads, mirrors; needlework
title: Boy's Jacket
